    • Field Detail

      • BOOTSTRAP_QUEUE_DEBUG_PROPERTY

        public static final String BOOTSTRAP_QUEUE_DEBUG_PROPERTY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DISPATCHER_ENABLED

        static boolean DISPATCHER_ENABLED
        Enables the iPOJO internal dispatcher. This internal dispatcher helps the OSGi framework to support large scale applications. The internal dispatcher is disabled by default.

      • SYNCHRONOUS_PROCESSING_ENABLED

        static boolean SYNCHRONOUS_PROCESSING_ENABLED
        Disables the iPOJO asynchronous processing. When set to false, the bundles are processed in the listener thread making iPOJO usable on Google App Engine. By default, the processing is asynchronous.

      • ENABLING_DISPATCHER

        private static final String ENABLING_DISPATCHER
        Property allowing to set if the internal dispatcher is enabled or disabled. Possible value are either true or false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SYNCHRONOUS_PROCESSING

        private static final String SYNCHRONOUS_PROCESSING
        Property allowing to disable the asynchronous process (and so enables the synchronous processing). Possible value are either true or false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(BundleContext context)
           throws Exception
        The iPOJO bundle is starting. This method configures the iPOJO system (internal dispatcher and bundle processing). Then it initiates the bundle processing.

        To optimize the processing, we process the iPOJO bundle first.

        Specified by:
        start in interface BundleActivator
        Parameters:
        context - the iPOJO's bundle bundle context
        Throws:
        Exception - something terrible happen during startup

      • stop

        public void stop(BundleContext context)
          throws Exception
        The iPOJO bundle is stopping.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface BundleActivator
        Parameters:
        context - the bundle context
        Throws:
        Exception - something terrible happen

      • getIPOJOBundleContext

        public static BundleContext getIPOJOBundleContext()
        Gets iPOJO bundle context.
        Returns:
        the iPOJO Bundle Context

      • enablingDispatcher

        private static void enablingDispatcher(BundleContext context,
                      Logger logger)
        Enables or disables the internal dispatcher, so sets the DISPATCHER_ENABLED flag. This method checks if the ENABLING_DISPATCHER property is set to true. Otherwise, the internal dispatcher is disabled. The property can be set as a system property (ipojo.internal.dispatcher) or inside the iPOJO bundle manifest (ipojo-internal-dispatcher).
        Parameters:
        context - the bundle context.
        logger - the logger to indicates if the internal dispatcher is set.

      • enablingSynchronousProcessing

        private static void enablingSynchronousProcessing(BundleContext context,
                                 Logger logger)
        Enables or disables the asynchronous processing, so sets the SYNCHRONOUS_PROCESSING_ENABLED flag. Disabling asynchronous processing avoids iPOJO to create a new thread to process bundles. So, iPOJO can be used on the Google App Engine. This method checks if the SYNCHRONOUS_PROCESSING property is set to true. Otherwise, asynchronous processing is used (default). The property can be set as a system property (ipojo.processing.synchronous) or inside the iPOJO bundle manifest.
        Parameters:
        context - the bundle context.
        logger - the logger to indicates if the internal dispatcher is set.
